command: cat input | while IFS= read -r subdomain; do python3 /home/op/recon/waymore/waymore.py -mode B -i $subdomain -oU waymore_results.txt -oR downloaded_responses; python3 /home/op/recon/xnLinkFinder/xnLinkFinder.py -i downloaded_responses/ -sf $subdomain -s429 -sTO -insecure -o xnlinkfinder_results.txt; cat waymore_results.txt xnlinkfinder_results.txt | sort -u > xnwayfinder_results.txt; trufflehog filesystem downloaded_responses/ --only-verified --concurrency=10 | tee -a trufflehog_downloaded_responses_results.txt; rm -r downloaded_responses waymore_results.txt xnlinkfinder_results.txt; done
